description: '''Hardcore''' (also known as '''hardcore techno''') is a genre of [[electronic dance music]] that originated in the Netherlands, Belgium, and Germany in the early 1990s. It is distinguished by faster [[tempo]]s (160 to 200 BPM or more) and a distorted [[sawtooth wave|sawtooth]] kick, the intensity of the [[Bass drum|kicks]] and the synthesized bass (in some subgenres), the [[rhythm]] and the atmosphere of the themes (sometimes violent), the usage of [[Distortion (music)|saturation]] and experimentation close to that of [[electronic body music|industrial dance music]]. It would spawn subgenres such as [[gabber]].
